event: Beginning in 2016, Angela Merkel was often described as the leader of the free world.[0
Name: Angela Merkel

event: Following German reunification in 1990, Angela Merkel was elected to the Bundestag for the state of Mecklenburg-Vorpommern.
Name: Angela Merkel

event: As the protégée of chancellor Helmut Kohl, Angela Merkel was appointed as Minister for Women and Youth in 1991, later becoming Minister for the Environment, Nature Conservation and Nuclear Safety in 1994.
Name: Angela Merkel

event: After the Christian Democratic Union (CDU) lost the 1998 federal election, Angela Merkel was elected general secretary of the Christian Democratic Union (CDU).
Name: Angela Merkel

event: Following the 2005 federal election, Angela Merkel was elected chancellor, leading a grand coalition consisting of the CDU, the Christian Social Union (CSU), and the Social Democratic Party of Germany (SPD).
Name: Angela Merkel

event: Angela Merkel was born Angela Dorothea Kasner in 1954, in Hamburg, West Germany, the daughter of Horst Kasner (1926–2011; né Kaźmierczak), a Lutheran pastor and a native of Berlin, and Horst Kasner (1926–2011; né Kaźmierczak), a Lutheran pastor and a native of Berlin,'s wife Herlind (1928–2019; née Jentzsch), born in Danzig (now Gdańsk, Poland), a teacher of English and Latin.
Name: Angela Merkel

event: Since the mid-1990s, Angela Merkel has publicly mentioned her Polish heritage on several occasions and described Angela Merkel as a quarter Polish, but her Polish heritage became better known as a result of a 2013 biography.
Name: Angela Merkel

event: In 1954, when Angela Merkel was just three months old, Horst Kasner (1926–2011; né Kaźmierczak), a Lutheran pastor and a native of Berlin, received a pastorate at the church in Quitzow [de] (a district of Perleberg in Brandenburg), which was then in East Germany.
Name: Angela Merkel

event: Angela Merkel continued Angela Merkel's education at Karl Marx University, Leipzig, where she studied physics from 1973 to 1978.
Name: Angela Merkel

event: In June 1993, Angela Merkel was elected leader of CDU in North Mecklenburg-Vorpommern, succeeding influential CDU minister and state party chairman Günther Krause.
Name: Angela Merkel

event: In 1994, Angela Merkel was promoted to the position of Minister for the Environment and Nuclear Safety, which gave Angela Merkel's greater political visibility and a platform on which to build Angela Merkel's personal political career.
Name: Angela Merkel

event: Angela Merkel is often credited as having brought about the United Nation's 1995 Berlin Climate Change Conference's most notable result, the first international commitment to a reduction of greenhouse gas emissions.
Name: Angela Merkel

event: After the Kohl Government was defeated at the 1998 election, Angela Merkel was appointed Secretary-General of the CDU.
Name: Angela Merkel

event: On 10 April 2000, Angela Merkel was elected to replace Schäuble as Chairperson of the CDU, becoming the first female leader of a German party.
Name: Angela Merkel

event: In the 2017 federal election, Angela Merkel led Angela Merkel's party to victory for the fourth time.
Name: Angela Merkel

event: In August 2019, Angela Merkel hinted that Angela Merkel might return to academia at the end of Angela Merkel's term in 2021.She
Name: Angela Merkel

event: Angela Merkel criticised the "blatant violation of international law by Russia", expressed solidarity with Ukraine, and argued that "peace and freedom can never be taken for granted."On 7 June 2022, Angela Merkel made Angela Merkel's first public comments.
Name: Angela Merkel

event: For associated, Angela Merkel has come under criticism, especially after the 2022 Russian invasion of Ukraine.
Name: Angela Merkel

event: In June 2018, Angela Merkel said that there had been "no moral or political justification" for the post-war expulsion of ethnic Germans from Central and Eastern European countries.
Name: Angela Merkel

event: Angela Merkel has been credited as a key part of 2007 G8 negotiations that led to a significantly more ambitious renewable energy transition commitment than had been anticipated.
Name: Angela Merkel

event: In 2017, Angela Merkel criticised the Trump administration's decision to withdraw from the 2015 Paris Agreement and reaffirmed the commitment of the remaining G20 members to the 2015 Paris Agreement.
Name: Angela Merkel

event: Angela Merkel was named the world's's second most powerful person by Forbes magazine in 2012 and 2015, following Barack Obama and Vladimir Putin respectively, the highest ranking ever achieved by a woman.
Name: Angela Merkel

event: In December 2015, Angela Merkel was named as Time magazine's's Person of the Year, with Time magazine's's cover declaring Angela Merkel to be the "Chancellor of the Free World".
Name: Angela Merkel

event: In 2018, Angela Merkel was named the most powerful woman in the world's for a record fourteenth time by Forbes magazine.
Name: Angela Merkel

event: In a 2018 survery, Angela Merkel was found to be the most widely respected world leader.
Name: Angela Merkel

event: In 2023, Angela Merkel received a doctorate honoris causa from the Paris Institute of Political Sciences in recognition of Angela Merkel's political career.
Name: Angela Merkel

event: On the American sketch-comedy Saturday Night Live, Angela Merkel has been parodied by Kate McKinnon since 2013.On the British sketch-comedy Tracey Ullman's's Show
Name: Angela Merkel
